name: Tapframe's Repo
subtitle: A source for all of my apps
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of my apps.

apps.name: Nuvio
apps.subtitle: Streaming app for movies and TV shows
apps.localizedDescription: Nuvio is a comprehensive streaming application that provides access to a vast library of movies and TV shows. Features include personalized recommendations, watch progress tracking, and seamless streaming experience.

versions.localizedDescription: Initial release of Nuvio streaming app

privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: App uses the local network to discover and connect to devices.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app does not require microphone access.
